LanguageData.SSMushSoup.label: Creamy Mushroom Soup
LanguageData.SSMushSoup.description: A soothing culinary blend of mushrooms, milk and insect jelly. Ideal as food for the sick or infirm in recovery as it improves mood and blood filtration slightly and adds a little recreation value. \n\nBe advised that it can make a person feeling more soporific, so best to ensure that their consciousness is not at a risky level.
